<<<<<<< HEAD
The summe of Christian doctrine written originally in Latine by John Gerhard ... and translated by Ralph Winterton ... Aphorismi succinct et selecti. English Gerhard, Johann, 1582-1637. Winterton, Ralph, 1600-1636.
[34], 303 p.
Printed by Roger Daniel, And are to be sold by William Hope, near the Exchange in Cornhill, Cambridge : 1640.
Translation, by Ralph Winterton, of Gerhard's "Aphorismi succincti et selecti". Contains added engraved t.p. Imperfect: stained, tightly bound, and with print show-through. Signatures: [par.]¹², A-N¹². Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
=======
